Author: amarinne
Name: Auto-Marketbuddy
Punchline: Automate your retainer pricing with AllaganMarket!
Description: Automatically sets retainer prices by integrating with AllaganMarket. Click an item, get market data, apply undercut, and confirm - all automatically. Supports batch processing of multiple items.
Changelog: * Initial release - automated retainer price adjustments with AllaganMarket integration
